Beach.aboutPlace: The Blue Peacock Beach House is a lovely Sri-Lankan style beachfront Property with private swimming pool located right on the beach at Hikkaduwa, just 1 km south of Hikkaduwa-center.
Beach.showMore: The Blue Peacock Beach House, one of the very few private houses on the beach in Hikkaduwa, is a TRUE beachfront property - with private swimming pool - superbly located right on a wide beach just south of the lively and popular Sri Lankan resort of Hikkaduwa. It is a self-catered house but on your request meals can be arranged.The beach house is completely renovated and decorated to a high standard. We have used quality bed linen and towels to ensure your stay is comfortable. We provide beach towels to avoid heavy suitcases!

Beach.name: Trincomalee,Sri Lanka
Beach.heading: Villa 238 - The Beach House-Dutch Bay Trincomalee
Beach.subheading: Entire townhouse in Trincomalee, Sri Lanka
Beach.aboutPlace: This lovingly restored  villa is situated right on the beach in beautiful Dutch Bay. It offers a rare opportunity to be embedded in authentic Sri Lankan culture while simultaneously secluded in comfort with modern luxuries and conveniences.
Beach.showMore: The villa is a fairly unique concept for Sri Lankan villa tourism. As you walk down the quaint residential street, or down the beach past the fisherman casting their nets in the same manner they have for centuries, you would have no idea that tucked behind the unassuming facade is a spacious and comfortable holiday villa with amazing sea views and almost every modern convenience.

Treehouses.name: Sainj,India
Treehouses.heading: Himalayan Abode Tree House in Sainj Valley
Treehouses.aboutPlace: This exquisite Tree House in the beautiful valley of Sainj is one of it's kind offering. You can enjoy the jaw-dropping view of snow-capped glaciers from the luxury of your soft, comfortable bed or explore the amazing treks to mountains, waterfalls and meadows around. Feel the warmth of the local host who assures you of the perfect hospitality.
Treehouses.showMore: Surrounded by lush green farmland and apple orchards, the Tree House contains a master bedroom, an attic and an attached washroom (with bathtub) along with three well-placed balconies that offers an unmatched view of the Himalayan range. There is a cafe with an indoor fireplace, a patio and a bonfire area available in case the guests want to enjoy the outdoors.

AmazingViews.name: Mashobra,India
AmazingViews.heading: StayVista at Eastbury 3BR w/ incredible views
AmazingViews.aboutPlace: Perched on a slope in a tranquil position, you'll find this beautiful cottage with the most incredible views. In fact, at the breathtaking Eastbury; every window is a view. An ideal location for mountain-lovers & hiking enthusiasts, one would feel like the Himalayas are hugging you at all times when you stay here. The ground floor of this European-inspired mountain home offers a contemporary living area that gives you an extremely homely feel, with the big, plump modern sofas.
AmazingViews.showMore: Blessed with private balconies, each bedroom at this home is a private oasis on its own. It is just perfect for enjoying your morning coffee while you breathe in that crisp, clean mountain air. Each season here can only be described as magical. In the summers, Set off to explore the Mall Road and Shimla Ridge just a short drive away from the villa and in the winters, you can go skiing or enjoy a snow-fight followed by a glass of wine with a movie.

AmazingViews.name: Himachal Pradesh,India
AmazingViews.heading: Zostel Shangarh | Standard Private Room
AmazingViews.subheading: Private room in hostel in India
AmazingViews.aboutPlace: Our Hostel in Shangarh is nestled under the verdant, forested mountain ranges of the Great Himalayan National Park. Dipped in scenic beauty and a meditative quiet air, this backpackers’ hostel in Himachal Pradesh offers sublime views of snow-capped mountains with an environment suited for artists, digital nomads, and creators.
AmazingViews.showMore: A vast common area at the rooftop invites you in with board games, cosy reading spots, a giant hammock, swings, and workstations with internet. Alongside, the hostel hosts the perfect environment for travellers to work, explore, and live with spaces like a bonfire area, private balconies, a local-favourite restaurant, and outdoor spaces for rejuvenation. To start the day, resort to the hostel’s common spaces made for yoga, music, meditation, art, and work alike. Relish fine meals with a splendid valley view, enjoying dishes from the Indian and continental cuisines. And to explore, take a walk at the nearby meadows and settlements or hike to the hidden waterfalls, and go birdtwatching on the winding trails of the national park. As evening approaches, enjoy a bonfire and set up your camp in the garden or resort to our spacious, mud-walled private rooms or warm and cosy dorms for a restful sleep.

AmazingViews.name: Harabagh,India
AmazingViews.heading: Zostel Homes Harabhag | Deluxe Private Room
AmazingViews.aboutPlace: Set amidst verdant rice farms and surrounded by lush mountains, Zostel Home Harabhag (Mandi) invites you for rejuvenation and solitude. Spend your days indulging in the slow life, as you take a soothing walk in the rice paddies, relish wholesome meals at the home, and gaze at starry skies with us
AmazingViews.showMore: Galore of rice paddies, sylvan water streams, and verdant hills, Harabhag welcomes you to the slow-paced life of Himachal Pradesh. It is a small farming village in the foothills of the mighty Dhauladar range, 20 km from Bir. Harabhag wins at blissful mountain experiences such as village walks, nature hikes, and picnics by the meandering streams.

Surfing.name: Paklok,Thailand
Surfing.heading: Rainbow Villa Shoowa Cape Yamu Luxury Sea View Villa with Butler Maid Breakfast
Surfing.aboutPlace: Villa Shoowa is situated on the tranquil Cape Yamu Peninsula, the villa is 4000,000 sqm of land, the building is 1400 sqm and has a panoramic view of the Andaman Sea.The villa is fully furnished with fine teak wood and furniture imported from Italy, blending contemporary Thai and European styles for a feeling of balance and comfort
Surfing.showMore: There are a total of 7 bedrooms in the villa. Time slows as the sea breeze lifts the curtains of the sea view rooms, allowing sunshine and a view of the blue sea to enter the rooms.Villa SHOOWA Cape Yamu offers guests a complimentary breakfast with Chinese, English and Thai flavors. The housekeeper and maids will communicate with guests in advance to ensure a delicious and exquisite breakfast is prepared.With a Dolby surround-sound room where you can watch lots of films. A 20m long infinity private pool with a view of the ocean.We provide luxurious natural plant bath products for our guests.The villa is has Chinese, English and Thai-speaking housekeepers and a live-in housemaid who will provide guests with quality and thoughtful service. The housekeeper can also plan tours for guests for free.The villa can accommodate 14 people, more than the number of people, 6-11 years old pay 1000 baht per night per person, 12 years old and above 2000 baht per person.The villa offers 3 kWh (1 kWh in the villa is equivalent to 40 kWh), and the excess is charged at 240 baht per kWh.A security deposit of 20,000 baht is required upon check-in.

Surfing.name: Vypin,India
Surfing.heading: Camper by the bay
Surfing.aboutPlace: stunning modern beach house on the Vypin Islands. The property boasts 5 ensuite bedrooms and offers exceptional views of the Arabian Sea, with direct access to the beautiful Cherai beach. The ideal destination for out-of-town groups, family get-togethers, anniversaries, bachelor/bachelorette parties, baby showers, birthday parties, team outings, and more.
Surfing.showMore: The 18 km long Cherai Beach is the one of the most popular beaches of Ernakulam district aka Kochi city. The beach is shallow and ideal for swimming and sunbathing except for the monsoon season(July-Sep), the sunsets are vivid and a sight in itself, dolphins are also seen regularly. Unique to Cherai the neighbourhood has narrow roads, lagoons and the world famous kerala backwaters. We are located just 500m from the main beach promenade with a large number of cafes, restaurants and beach activities.

Surfing.name: Choeng Thale,Thailand
Surfing.heading: Villa Amonteera
Surfing.subheading: Entire villa in Choeng Thale, Thailand
Surfing.aboutPlace: This magnificent, modern, fully staffed (chef and driver) private villa has some of the best ocean views on Phuket. 9 of our 10 main bedrooms with king size beds have magnificent views, beautiful en-suite bathrooms with jacuzzis (7 out of 10), large flat screen TVs, and built in closets.
Surfing.showMore: Majestically located on a hill overlooking Bangtao and Surin beaches (the latter hidden by trees), Villa Amonteera has some of the best views on Phuket and exudes modern luxury and opulence at every turn. The architecture of Villa Amonteera makes the most of the outstanding views, which are hard to match even on Phuket.The 8 king size bed rooms are decorated in modern fashion with built in closets, 46-55 inch flat screen TVs with satellite TV and DVD players, airconditioning, balconies, and en-suite bathrooms with showers and jacuzzis (all but one). The Master Bedroom Suite consists of one of the king size rooms, located on the corner with large windows, and the room with a queen sized bed. The two spaces share a bathroom which has two showers rather than a shower and a jacuzzi.

Surfing.showMore: Auraliya sits in an acre of tropical garden adorned by frangipani trees and coconut palms with breathtaking views. Our six bedroomed villa is located on Palutagaha beach, which when weather patterns permit is a beautiful coral-reef-protected sandy beach. At other times the beach-view becomes a sea-view and stick fishermen frequent the lagoon. A sandy plage is maintained inside the sea-wall at all times for children to play in. Auraliya can comfortably accomodate a maximum of twelve guests.

Surfing.name: Thrissur,India
Surfing.heading: Anchorage - The Beach Villa
Surfing.aboutPlace: Escape to your own private paradise at Anchorage - a stunning Beachfront villa that offers the ultimate in luxury and relaxation. Located right on the sandy shores, you'll wake up to the sound of waves crashing and the feel of sea breezes on your skin
Surfing.showMore: Escape to your own private paradise at Anchorage - a stunning Beachfront villa that offers the ultimate in luxury and relaxation. Located right on the sandy shores, you'll wake up to the sound of waves crashing and the feel of sea breezes on your skin. With breathtaking ocean views from every room, Anchorage is the perfect retreat for those seeking the ultimate beachfront experience. Anchorage has everything you need for an unforgettable getaway. Come and discover your own piece of paradise.

Castles.name: Burja,India
Castles.heading: 8 rooms @Castle Oodeypore
Castles.aboutPlace: Castle Oodeypore is a palatial homestay, offering a unique experience. It is a home that hosts beautiful people and connects families, friends, and travelers alike, a castle that reminds you of the bygone era, a place for our guests to revel in the timeless beauty of nature.
Castles.showMore: Built-in the year 2021 Castle Oodeypore is an architectural marvel amidst the foothills of the Aravallis, made from the red sandstone of Bikaner, making it the only red sandstone property in Udaipur.
text1: Room in a castle
Your own room in a home, plus access to shared spaces.
text2: Shared common spaces

text3: Dedicated bathroom
This place has a bathroom that's just for you

Castles.name: Bad Wimsbach-Neydharting,Austria
Castles.heading: Schloss Wimsbach, Austria - South Suite
Castles.aboutPlace: Wimsbach Castle is in a scenically and culturally exceptional location. Guests enjoy nearly six acres (over 2 hectares) of private park as well as the area's outstanding cultural treasures and proximity to Austria's lake district. The village is embedded in a nature reserve, offering guests endless local walking and biking opportunities. The baroque churches and monasteries in the area are exceptional, and lakes, mountains and beautiful villages like Bad Ischl and Hallstatt are in easy reach.
Castles.showMore: From this year, fishing on the estate's 6.5 kilometres of river is also available to guests.Another special feature this year is that the Salzkammergut region is a 2024 European Capital of Culture, with numerous associated events and exhibitions.

Castles.name: Sinaia,Romania
Castles.heading: Royal Boutique Hotel - VILA DOMINA
Castles.subheading: Room in boutique hotel in Sinaia, Romania
Castles.aboutPlace: The Lucia Villa Complex entices you to discover the true meaning of chic. A charm forged by the fusion of city comfort and closeness to nature, by the traditional and the modern, the local and the cosmopolitan spirit…
Castles.showMore: Villa Domina - a petite castle built around the time Peleş was created – welcomes you with its graceful line and its tall, luminous openings. Situated right across the entrance alley that leads to Peles Castle, you will find here a universe of elegance that will unfold before your eyes as you take your first steps. The rooms offer you an oasis of serenity and comfort, and are a perfect place for your holiday.

Castles.name: Lakonia,Greece
Castles.heading: Petrongonas family Castle in Mani
Castles.aboutPlace: Unique picturesque and authentic tower in a traditional settlement in Southern Peloponnesus. If you want to get to know the real Greece, this is for you! Ideal for excursions across the most beautiful places in Peloponnesus
Castles.showMore: An authentic, fully furnished, recently renovated castle with great views.Around 2 centuries ago, our grandparents decided to build a castle for their winter stays and to protect themselves from enemies, from the war. On the ground floor you can find the olive press that the residents had in order to make their olive oil.

Castles.name: Positano,Italy
Castles.heading: Luxury home Torre Trasita in Positano (6 people)
Castles.aboutPlace: Luxurious residence in the historic Torre del '500 on the beach in Positano for a wonderful holiday full of unforgettable charm. Independent castle overlooking the sea, sleeps up to 6.
Castles.showMore: Ideal for a family or group of 6 people who want to live Positano day and night, visit the Coast by sea in total relaxation. The tower is 300 meters from the beach, the pier, shopping center, restaurants, supermarket and take away! It allows you to get around on foot away from traffic and chaos.

Castles.name: Ljusdal,Sweden
Castles.heading: Lôkes - large and unique Hälsingegård in Järvsö
Castles.aboutPlace: Welcome to stay in a very special Hälsingegård, a world heritage. At Lôkes you meet anthem from the 16th century. The manor house was built as a guest house 1846 and holds a rich history.You live close to skiing, swimming, the river, Järvsö center, Järvzoo, the bicycle park and bike trails, Stene Gård's nice area and all activities Järvsö offers.
Castles.showMore: In our wooden castle, apart from six different bedrooms, there are also two lounges, three bathrooms and one separate toilets, two kitchens, one of which has room for large parties to have meals. On the front there is also a lovely punch veranda. The farm is 1.2 ha and also houses several other buildings. Three old cultural farm houses, one from the 16th century when the farm originated. In these, it is great to spend the summer in the air mattress. We also have a carriage rider, where you can have an outdoor party, but still sit under the roof.

Castles.name: Osowa Sien,Poland
Castles.heading: Exclusive Castle Retreat: The Palace at Osowa Sien
Castles.aboutPlace: Welcome to The Palace at Osowa Sien, our private fairytale residence nestled within a 5 Ha park, just 3 hours from Berlin or Warsaw.Perfect for families, corporate groups, or friends, our castle accommodates up to 42 guests and offers amenities like: a cozy Finnish sauna, a wellness studio, a fully-equipped kitchen, a fireplace salon, dining room, a place to dance, terrace and park.
Castles.showMore: Planning to host a wedding or milestone event here? Please contact us directly if you would like an event services and catering offer. These things cannot be arranged on AirBnB.This is our private residence so we've tried to think of and include all essentials for you to ensure a very comfortable stay including but not limited to:Electric, eco-pellet Heating, firewood for the fireplaces or bonfires, premium all-natural spa towels from Aegean cotton, designer soft-cotton linens from textile designers.
